alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 7:42PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 830 PM MST... At 741 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bosque, or 7 miles northeast of Gila Bend, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gila Bend, Estrella, Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, Bosque, Estrella Sailport, Cotton Center, Sonoran National Monument, Ak- Chin Village and Mobile. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 115 and 132. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 42. AZ Route 85 between mile markers 1 and 3, and between mile markers 119 and 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Gila Bend; Northwest Pinal County; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument; South Mountain, Ahwatukee; Tonopah Desert; West Pinal County
